mapper.insert: insert into db_mailcontent (SEQUENCEID, STYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, CORPID, TITLE, CONTENT) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_mailcontent set STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, STYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, CORPID, TITLE, CONTENT from db_mailcontent where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, STYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, CORPID, TITLE, CONTENT from db_mailcontent
